name: Surprising Shift At Santas
description:
As a prize for being the most well behaved person in the world, Santa has left you in charge of his workshop while he delivers presents!

However, the elves there are a bit rambunctious at night, and may attempt to attack you.

Luckily, Santa has equipped you with the best state of the art technology, A Flashlight, A Gun, A Camera and Vent Map, and Doors that for some reason drain power.

Will you survive the elves of christmas?

Made in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020

Engine: Clickteam Fusion 2.5

____________________________________________________________

IMPORTANT: a lot of games made in Clickteam set off false flags for your antivirus, and the game may be detected as one on your computer. To read more about this, please check out this helpful tweet: https://twitter.com/Popgoes6/status/1331770727725461504

____________________________________________________________
